title: Spatial organization of Europe and North America

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, D, and E. Describe the similarities and differences in the spatial organization of cities in Western Europe and North America in terms of the following aspects. A. Geographic size B. Height and design of buildings in central business district C. Public space D. Patterns of economic class E. Ethnic neighborhoods

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, C, D, and E. Describe the similarities and differences in the spatial organization of cities in Western Europe and North America in terms of the following aspects. A. Geographic size B. Height and design of buildings in central business district C. Public space D. Patterns of economic class E. Ethnic neighborhoods

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
